useCase.name: URL Analytics

preconditions.precondition: The user inputs or selects a URL for analytics.

successEndConditions.condition: The data analytics for the URL is displayed on the page.

useCase.trigger: User inputs or selects a URL for analytics.

mainSequence.step: User inputs or selects a URL for analytics.
Send a request for analytics data.
Retrieve analytics data for the URL.
Query analytics data from the database.
Send the analytics data to the page.
Display the analytics data for the URL.
